law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 32, effective July 15, 1988 -- Transferred and amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, secs. 1 and 71. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3872, 3873.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Action not to be brought before demand -- Exception -- When additional affidavit unnecessary.
